experiences.title: Dashboard Configurator
body: Created an application which users can create their own ui templates called 'tiles' and create pages called 'dashboards' by binding the data of their home-automation devices to 'tiles' and interact with them on 'dashbboards'. I worked on almost all aspects of this project including development, sprint planning and estimation, code review and build management.
Some of my achievements are:
- Provided a flexible solution for storing/displaying ui's created by end user.
- Created a drag/drop designer view for data binding to ui elements
- Reduced app bundle size by %40
- Identified and fixed memory leakage issue
- Implemented web worker for non-blocking communication with APIs
Tech stack: Vue, Javascript, HTML/CSS, SCSS, Vuex, webpack, ESlint, Git

experiences.title: Ginoa.io
body: Contract work for a web3 application that i did on my free-time about NFT bartering and trading.
Things I worked on:
- Deciding tech stack, general app layout
- Creating responsive ui elements and data binding from APIs.
- Added virtualizaton for rendering a lot NFTs with great performance and paging/loading capabilities
Tech stack: React, Typescript, Tailwind, React-query, Recharts, Headless-ui, Vite

experiences.title: NuMessage - Vuexp
body: Worked on a 'Skype' like cross-platform and web messaging project and cross-platform libraries.
-Developing new components
-Writing documentation and unit tests
Tech stack: Nativescript-Vue, Vue, Javascript, HTML/CSS, SCSS.

experiences.title: E-commerce platform
body: Worked on an e-commerce application which i wrote several plugins using google analytics. My responsibilites include developing and documentation of plugins.
Tech stack: NopCommerce, C#, .net, Javascript, Google Analytics

experiences.title: Pincident
body: Created a web based admin panel for an incident management application which city halls receive incident reports from citizens in the selected areas using google map apis in the panel. I was the only person responsible for the web panel. Worked in a small team of developers which consists me as the web developer, one backend and one crossplatform developer.
Tech stack: Angular, Typescript, rxjs, HTML/CSS
